code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{ReactTyped}from'react-typed';import'../styles/ContactForm.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContactForm=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await axios.post('/api/user/store',{email});alert(`Thanks for signing up, ${email}!`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"contact",id:"contact",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReactTyped,{strings:['Sign up to be the first to know when we launch!'],typeSpeed:50,backSpeed:30,loop:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"contact-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Enter your email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Notify Me"})]})})]});};export default ContactForm;
